contexts.context: ...Llethan, High Councilor and Lord of Morrowind, imposes favorable <mark>tariffs</mark> on flin [an imported fortified Imperial alcoholic beverage]. The council...
...fortified Imperial alcoholic beverage]. The council protests the continuing burdensome <mark>tariffs</mark> on the native beverages sujamma, greef, and shein....
...Lord of Morrowind, grants relief to merchants complaining of high <mark>tariffs</mark> on imported alcoholic beverages.
...over the high tax rates and the injurious effect of high <mark>tariffs</mark> on trade.
